name: 3D Avatar Creator | Bemoji
description: Bemoji, your personal 3D avatar creator & emoji maker. Create your own 3D avatar emojis & memoji by Bemoji avatar creator, emoji maker, gif maker with tons of options. Share your 3D memoji on Snapchat, Instagram and TikTok to get more likes. Use bemoji emoji keyboard to chat with friends.  Key Feature:  3D Avatar Creator & Memoji Maker Bemoji provides a great variety of face character and outfit options to make it looks just like you. You can use Bemoji 3D avatar maker to create your own character and face emoji. It is a perfect memoji maker for Android.   Emoji Maker, Gif Maker & Sticker Maker Use Bemoji to make your own animated avatar emoji to chat with friends in messenger, imessage or facetime. Its also a cute sticker maker for you to edit photos.   Emoji Keyboard Bemoji emoji keyboard makes it easier to share your memoji and personal emoji stickers with your friends.   Get More Followers Create more fabulous photos, videos about your avatar using other features in Bemoji. Share it on Snapchat, Instagram, TikTok and other social media to get more likes for your post & story and boost your Snapchat, Tik Tok, Instagram followers.
